subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Last year, several N.F.L. teams used the franchise tag on players who fell well short of the franchise quarterback standard. And with a new formula, the salaries have dipped.
snippet: Last year, several N.F.L. teams used the franchise tag on players who fell well short of the franchise quarterback standard. And with a new formula, the salaries have dipped.
